title: FeatureOS
description: Say hello to featureOS (formerly Hellonext) 👋🏻 – your new best friend for gathering, analyzing & prioritizing user feedback in a flash. It’s your all-in-one spot for feedback, roadmaps, and changelog. Let Kal 🧞‍♂️ - the featureOS AI guide you to make smarter, data-driven decisions. Close that feedback loop & level up your product game like a pro with featureOS! 🏆
